name: Aurelia Release Notes - June 2018
description: June is a significant month for Aurelia. Our latest set of releases adds some great new features for our templating engine, allowing more seamless Webpack builds and an even more unobtrusive programming model. We've also made huge improvements to our binding engine, including adding new keywords and beefing up performance. Finally, the Aurelia Store plugin was released! Read on to get the details from the Aurelia Core Team.
